comments: Ball (CHA) steps forward into Rubio's (CLE) path and delivers contact with his lower body that affects Rubio's SQBR.
Ball (CHA) momentarily places his hand to Allen's (CLE) arm and immediately slides his hand off as he disengages.  The reaction from Allen is not consistent with the contact from Ball.
Allen (CLE) is already in Ball's (CHA) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Plumlee (CHA) brings his arm down and makes contact with Allen's (CLE) arm, affecting his shot near the rim.
Allen (CLE) establishes himself in a screening position in Rozier's (CHA) path and absorbs the contact.
Plumlee (CHA) is drawn into the air toward Sexton (CLE) on a pump fake, and makes body to body contact with Sexton prior to making any contact with the ball.
Ball (CHA) is retreating his arm into a vertical position and he absorbs the marginal contact from Mobley (CLE) as he defends the shot near the rim.
Rozier (CHA) and Allen (CLE) briefly engage and disengage after the pick.
Garland (CLE) brushes Plumlee's (CHA) arm as Plumlee is securing the rebound, and contact is marginal.
Garland (CLE) legally contests Rozier's (CHA) jump shot attempt.
Plumlee (CHA) commits a take foul on Allen (CLE).
Plumlee (CHA) is already in Osman's (CLE) path and is firming up when contact occurs.
Bridges (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in Garland's (CLE) path and marginal contact occurs as they disengage.
Allen (CLE) turns his lower body slightly towards Rozier's (CHA) path, and marginal contact occurs as Rozier is able to maintain his desired path.
Ball (CHA) commits a take foul on Garland (CLE).
Rozier (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in Allen's (CLE) path and absorbs the contact.
Ball (CHA) and Garland (CLE) engage and disengage with one another off ball.
Ball (CHA) commits a take foul on Garland (CLE).
